post:
Hi Guys,

So we have launched our new KVM VPS servers with DDoS protection, you can signup and get £2.50 free credit to try our services.

They start from £2.50 per month for 512Mb RAM.

What you get for £2.50;

- 512Mb RAM

- 10GB SSD Disk

- 1 CPU Core

- 1TB Transfer

- DDoS Protection up to 500Gbps global filtering

- 1 IP Address 

- UK data centre

Signup and view the plans here [zare.co.uk/cloud](http://zare.co.uk/cloud)

After you signup, just submit a ticket and request for your limit to be raised to 1.

Best Regards,
Zare
